title: Evenly Distributed Children
description: In this lab, we will explore the basics of CSS programming and learn how to apply styles to HTML documents. Through a series of hands-on exercises, you will learn how to create and modify CSS rules, use selectors to target specific elements, and apply styles to text, backgrounds, and borders. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of CSS and be able to use it to create visually appealing web pages.
